info.title: ATEN Wireless Presentation RESTful API
info.description: The API for ATEN Wireless Presentation

protocol.description: The Data Set API is accessible via https and http

tags.name: BeforeLogin
tags.description: Actions other than logging into the settings page do not require a token

isAdminInit.description: The default password must be changed when the system is initialized.

isModerationInit.description: The default password must be changed when the system is initialized.

post.description: Enter the password to log in to the station settings page
Uploading wallpaper, firmware, or configuration will always use this

failed_1200.summary: The input file format is unavailable

value.errorMsg: The input file is unavailable: Not a image file
The input value is unavailable: not in allow_list: [Auto, 3840x2160, 1920x1080, 1366x768, 1280x720, 1024x768, 1920x1200]

get.description: Display Wi-Fi list, only visible in 'Other AP' mode
Display Wi-Fi connection info, only visible in 'Other AP' mode with a connected Wi-Fi network

post.description: Manually add Wi-Fi connection info, only visible in 'Other AP' mode

patch.description: Connect to SSID from Wi-Fi list, only visible in 'Other AP' mode

delete.description: Forget Wi-Fi connection, only visible in 'Other AP' mode with a connected Wi-Fi network

connected.description: If Wi-Fi is set to bridge mode, this field is needed to determine subsequent actions

parameters.name: hasNew
parameters.description: When true, check for OTA updates, otherwise only display version number

post.description: Both manual and remote updates use the same API, controlled by the isManual variable

parameters.name: isManual
parameters.description: When true, manual update; when false, remote update

init_password.description: On first entry to the station screen, a password reset is required. This operation does not require X-API-KEY or username and cannot be tested via Swagger

failed_1100_new_confirm_not_match.summary: New & Confirm Password do not match

value.errorMsg: The input value is unavailable: passwords do not match
The input value is unavailable: current password is wrong
The input value is unavailable: not matches the pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{1,16}$

failed_1100_the_same.summary: Current password & new password are the same

value.errorMsg: The input value is unavailable: current password & new password are the same

failed_1100_init_pass.summary: (init) New password cannot use the preset password

value.errorMsg: The input value is unavailable: New password cannot use the preset password

get.description: Retrieve the activation status of all projection features

patch.description: Set the activation status of projection features

post.description: The settings will be reset to factory values, but the firmware version will not be reset

get.description: Retrieve the system log download status
Retrieve system log information and download progress

put.description: Download system logs to a designated folder on the Station

password.description: Default is password, but users can change it

devName.description: Changing this will disconnect all networks, requiring a restart

codeValue.description: If codeType is fixed, need code.

gatekeeper.description: The rule of gatekeeper: 0(Allow All), 1(Internet Only), 2(Block All)

eapMethod.description: Required when security is set to EAP

phase.description: Required when security is set to EAP

identity.description: Required when security is set to EAP

isStaticIp.description: Only true requires filling in static IP related information

time.description: -1 indicates never & the unit is minutes

x-enum-descriptions: 1004,Basic Auth or APP Key is unavailable

rebootRequired.description: The device needs to reboot to apply this new change.
The device needs to reboot to apply this new change.

failed_1001.summary: User or APP Key is unavailable

value.errorMsg: User or APP Key is unavailable.

failed_1004.summary: Basic Auth or APP Key is unavailable

value.errorMsg: Basic Auth or APP Key is unavailable.

value.errorMsg: The input file format is unavailable.

idParameter.name: id
idParameter.description: Default wallpaper 0 and 1 cannot be replaced or delete

ApiKeyAuth.description: The API Key for issuing a RESTful API request.
